Loading ggplot2 and plotting speed vs dist from cars dataset

```{r c2}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(cars,aes(x = speed, y = dist))+
  geom_point()+
  labs(title = "Car speed vs Distance", x = 'Speed', y = 'Distance')
```
